title: Data shows that long-term subscribers are abandoning Netflix
content:
A new independent survey shows that Netflix’s most loyal users accounted for almost 13 percent of account cancellations in the first quarter of 2022. Recently, Netflix reported its first decline in subscribers in more than ten years and announced that it lost around 200,000 subscribers in Q1 2022. description: Netflix's recent woes are only the tip of the iceberg. Its loss of 200,000 subscribers in Q1 2022 reportedly includes a significant chunk of long-term subscribers.
